caption: My recent visit to Illucity Paris for the VR Escape Room was an unforgettable experience! We chose the Notre Dame Br√ªle escape experience, and it was loads of fun. The immersive VR technology made us feel like we were truly there, right in the heart of the action.  The details and realism of the virtual environment were impressive, and the puzzles were both challenging and engaging. The experience was incredibly well-designed, and we had a blast working together to solve the puzzles and complete the mission.  Illucity Paris exceeded our expectations with their fantastic VR escape room. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a unique and thrilling adventure. We can't wait to return and try out the other experiences they offer!

Decent Virtual Reality Experience but Could be Better  If you're looking for an immersive virtual reality experience in Paris, Illucity La D√©fense is worth a visit. The technology used in the games is impressive and the visuals are stunning. However, the experience could have been better if there were more diverse gameplays available.  While the service was attentive, it lacked interest in our needs. We had to inquire about the games available, and the staff seemed unenthusiastic about providing recommendations.  Despite this, the ambiance was enjoyable, and the equipment was comfortable to use. The quality of the products and services offered was impressive, but it would be great if they could offer more varied game options to cater to a wider range of visitors.  Illucity La D√©fense's unique feature is their virtual reality games, which offer a thrilling experience. But the games on offer could be more diverse, and the service could be more enthusiastic in catering to the visitors' needs.  For these reasons, we are rating Illucity La D√©fense 3 stars out of 5. We recommend it for anyone looking for a unique virtual reality experience, but with the caveat that they might want to research the games available before visiting.  We appreciate the effort the staff and management have put into making the experience enjoyable, and we hope to see more diverse game options in the future.

Great selection of experiences and very good customer service. We did the Assassin‚Äôs Creed: Origins-style game and it was a lot of fun. Expect to work together, expect some mild disorientation, and if you dislike (virtual) heights, you may want to choose another experience.

Great experience in discovery ancient Egypt .  We were in 4. Virtual reality team game , well designed old √©gyptien setting  that bring you inside the experience of getting the secrets to move to the next door or floor .

Excellent experience.  High quality games and environment.  The staff was very helpful to book an event for 10 people.  The value is excellent.  We all had an excellent time and I would recommend to anyone. The games and instructions are available in French and in English.

They should charge extra time when we cannot finish the mission, or at least pay attention when we require some help. It was the first time playing and they did not help much. The idea is to have a good experience but without any help it's impossible.
Nice staff. Great for older kids and adults. The experience for kids under 8 is not fully functional. A lot of glitches.
Trade centre of Europe and all skyscrapers..in this area very beautiful place in Paris to roam around..must visit if you are in paris
I have had 4 encounters with this place. None has been positive. Hopefully some day
Kids had lot of fun and the team were nice!
Awesome

Positive point: - Variety of activities and their rather well-done graphics.  Negative points: - Impossible to actually travel (see no travel planned in certain activity). To do this you have to aim for a point on the ground. - The price: ‚Ç¨22 for 20-25min - Staff: Not professional. Between those who forget to tell us a certain key, those who tell us the opposite and finally NO ONE to monitor if everything is going well/if there are no bugs, this is unacceptable. We got stuck for 5-10 minutes because the game was scheduled for 7 instead of 6. We didn't immediately dare to take off our headsets to ask for assistance in person, preferring to raise our hands and call them. Besides, before the game they didn't tell us what to do if we had a technical problem...  If you're going there for shooting/zombie shooting, go in an EVA. The difference will be striking in addition to actually being able to move around. And the price: ~20‚Ç¨ for 40min.

Top experience. The escapes are well developed with quality graphics. Immersion guaranteed, fun for all ages with games offered according to age and experience in VR. The team is really nice... a little help when we're struggling... thank you

A Virtual Reality session accessible to the whole family, a pleasant and friendly welcome, the room just for us (no one else to shout next to us). The Aqualia experience is very demanding but should be reserved for families with young children. It's an exploration to find treasures in an underwater setting, no story or mechanics to understand.

There were 4 of us to play the Incarna adventure and we really loved it. The game is very immersive and the use of the bow, for certain actions and fights, gives a very nice little extra. We now want to move on to Incarna 2!
Great family experience on VR Toyland. We move around the setting dismantling broken toys in the company of a rather funny corporal. A little expensive perhaps? 120‚Ç¨ for 4 for 40min.
The content is very interesting but the Gaudi experience is too short and the noise generated by moving in an open room is annoying
Excellent welcome, warm and smiling staff. Clear explanations. An excellent experience to be repeated as soon as possible

A real immersive adventure.  Impressive to find yourself in dangerous situations. On the other hand, a little disappointed with the welcome and departure which are almost non-existent and not very warm. It‚Äôs a shame that the adventure doesn‚Äôt begin from the doorstep as is very often the case in other escape games.

Super friendly staff who put you at ease and explain very well in an educational way. There is a wide variety of activities and themes (games, escape games, etc.) depending on the number of players. And finally the equipment is well cleaned after use. It's really perfect

I would like to express my deep dissatisfaction following my recent experience booking on your site for a virtual reality slot. That evening, at the appointed time, my friends and I excitedly arrived to enjoy our session. However, we were extremely disappointed and surprised by the treatment we received from your staff (a young girl).  Indeed, despite the slot still open, the person in charge, who I presume to be your employee, categorically refused to take care of us, without any valid explanation. His attitude was not only rude but also unacceptable, especially considering we were punctual and willing to attend our reservation.  This lack of professionalism and courtesy on the part of your team seriously marred our experience and left a very negative impression. As a customer, I expected a warm welcome and attentive service, which unfortunately was not the case.  Not to mention the loss of turnover for you.

Last test of a virtual "escape game" and I'll do it again! Good immersion, the puzzles are well thought out to get everyone involved. For those who know VR and have already done escape games, we recommend the one on Medusa, the one on the pyramids is quite simple, even for the first time. One star less because my microphone didn't work, it would have been nice to check before the game started.

I found the experience really great and very interesting for people like me who play on the console but who didn't know the VR world. With my 12 year old son we did the eclipse mission. By taking our time to explore the environment and complete the missions, it took us 34 minutes. The game master of the day was really great, his welcome and his explanations were perfect.
The experience was really great! It was our first time playing, and we loved it. The graphics are incredible, and the game itself is really great üëçüèº ‚Ä¶
We came today, a great experience! We will definitely come back! Thank you also for the welcome and the explanations! Everything was very clear!

Top VR games room, a very wide choice of games. Gorgeous graphics. An incredible experience, even for children (from 8 years old for the Corsair's Curse). Despite a somewhat disappointing last experience due to a hardware problem, the staff was very attentive. Those responsible were able to react, beyond our expectations. We will come back without hesitation to try other adventures.

Very bad experience which could not even begin since the young woman at reception did not accept that I could check if with my glasses I could have good vision with a helmet (I am no longer all young and with my glasses I have problems), not to mention that upon arrival the sliding door apparently remained blocked it did not open automatically and when asking if it was normal the response from this same person was made in a rather unpleasant tone, my question should not have please him (plus half slumped in his chair that's not very professional), so given the reception and the refusal to allow a person who nevertheless explains his problem with glasses to be able to try a headset, the experience is not not worth more than one star.

I had my first VR experience with my girlfriend with the ‚ÄúEclipse‚Äù scenario. The welcome and explanations were clear. An immersive and accessible game for beginners. I'm still reluctant because at 27 minutes of play, we were surprised to see the scoreboard appear, we had already finished! (the game is announced for 45 minutes). It‚Äôs a shame, especially when you pay ‚Ç¨60. I would have liked to be closer to 45 minutes rather than half an hour‚Ä¶

very pleasant welcome, a really interesting game and beautiful graphics, a little complicated for novices. Unfortunately, the equipment was too faulty and, above all, the room was not really soundproof because we had to put up with the very intrusive screams from the large, open neighboring room. Really a shame because it was very disturbing (often we heard these screams more than our own voices via the headset) and tiring

Excellent experience. We are escape game fans. Playing in virtual reality gives an additional challenge. The settings are incredibly realistic and make the game really different. On the other hand, the "puzzles" are too basic and deserve to be more "serious" and difficult. We made the game Eclipse which is not for beginners. only downside!
A superb experience! An already original concept! The staff made us feel very welcome! Smiling and funny! Big thanks to the game masters! To do again without worries, I highly recommend! ‚ò∫Ô∏è

Great experience I would have given a 5 but the after-sales service is not great I am waiting for a response to my emails of April 27 and May 3 üòî otherwise friendly staff and I recommend the contagion game üòâ ‚Ä¶
1st incredible experience! We did ‚ÄúNotre Dame is burning‚Äù. Very realistic images and super immersion. Very good game history. Very kind and available staff. We will come back for sure :)!

We did the pyramids mission and overall it was pretty cool. The mission itself was fun. On the other hand, big negative note for our unpleasant game master, who didn't even come to see us at the end of the mission to ask us if it had gone well. Additionally, there were sound issues during the mission that were not fixed, despite the fact that we had reported them. We could hear one player very loudly and the others very little. Last point, we were right next to other players who were playing another game and we could hear them talking, it was quite unpleasant.

Fun activities to do. Friendly welcome, clear explanations of the games. Several games and for several ages with different levels available. To play with 2 or more. To discover and do. The virtual is really nice and graphically it's beautiful. Remember to book in advance as it is often full.
A great experience with a multitude of routes on offer!

Reservations made for 9:15 p.m., eclipse room on 09/11. We arrived and everything was closed even though we had someone on the phone in the afternoon who had taken our reservation. Very disappointed to have made the trip for nothing. Please notify us if you decide to close and cancel our reservation.

Extra! There were 3 of us, of different ages and with varying levels of virtual reality, and we all had a blast in Toyland. A super well-made game, very addictive and totally immersive. We loved being able to interact together, going in a helicopter, being on a roller coaster or dropped by parachute. We don't see the time passing. And the very friendly team (and educational with newbies) takes nothing away from the pleasure of being there. Thanks for everything! We feel good there, and the arcade game in the lobby doesn't make us want to leave.
